long.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
long.author: Mark Twain

long.text: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.
long.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

long.text: The mind is everything. What you think, you become.
long.author: Gautama Buddha

long: Nothing can stop the man with the right mental attitude from achieving his goal; nothing on earth can help the man with the wrong mental attitude. ~ Thomas Jefferson
For success, attitude is equally as important as ability. ~ Walter Scott
A person often meets his destiny on the road he took to avoid it. ~ Jean de La Fontaine
Positive anything is better than negative nothing. Elbert Hubbard
Donâ€™t judge each day by the harvest that you reap but by the seeds that you plant. Robert Louis Stevenson
